author: lorijo
post: Maria, Praise is the perfect weapon because it brings God right down into our midst. Remember that God inhabits the praises of his people. He comes down and solves what is troubling you. Your testimony proves that. Wild praise in every circumstance, good and bad, brings the King of Kings down to help you right where you are. Awesome!.
title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
